alert.note: Alert for George; Greene; Perry (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 25 at 9:04PM CST until January 26 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Mobile AL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Mississippi... Leaf Near Mclain affecting Greene, George and Perry Counties. For the Leaf River...including Mclain, New Augusta...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING TO EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Leaf near Mclain. * WHEN...From Friday morning to early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Considerable flooding of agricultural and lowlands near the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 PM CST Thursday the stage was 17.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 18.0 feet tomorrow morning and then fall below flood stage by tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/mob.
